thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel, great service
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel, great service - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kris L
title: Amazing hotel, great service
text:
Amazing hotel in La Defance.
10 minutes away from the city centre
Very convenient location next to the Metro Station
Fantastic service and facilities
We were lucky enough to be upgraded to one of the suites with an incredible view of Paris, including of the Eiffel Tower. The room itself was extremely well appointed. The famous Melia bed quality is very much the case. I cannot remember the last time my bed was so comfy :)
We will be back
